name: Night Desert
description:
You start in the small houses. In this game you need to escape from the desert and find the bubble particle for ended. If you out of the terrain it wont fall forever. Don't afraid to be alone, Because there no ghost in here, No Timer and the flashlight is unlimited, so the battery wont shut down. I Suggest you play this in "Simple" Quality.

Controls: WASD / Arrow Key for Walk, Shift is Run & Space bar for jump.
